I started surfing when I was four.
I don't really get scared in the ocean.
It feels like, it's like wanting you to catch more and stuff.
My name is Quincy Symonds and they call me "The Flying Squirrel."
The very first time I saw her out in the ocean,...
...she changed, she became a complete person.
I'm amazed by it, I'm really proud of it.
But to be honest, I can't comprehend how she does it...
...and how she's done it so quickly.
She's probably close to the best six-year-old skater and surfer...
